description:
Provides a RAM password policy configuration for entire account. Only one resource per account.

-> **NOTE:** This resource overwrites an existing configuration. During action `terraform destroy` it sets values the same as defaults for this resource (it does not preserve any preexisted configuration).

-> **NOTE:** Available in 1.46.0+

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

HardExpiry.description: Specifies if a password can expire in a hard way. Default to false.

MaxLoginAttempts.description: Maximum logon attempts with an incorrect password within an hour. Valid value range: [0-32]. Default to 5.

MaxPasswordAge.description: The number of days after which password expires. A value of 0 indicates that the password never expires. Valid value range: [0-1095]. Default to 0.

MinimumPasswordLength.description: Minimal required length of password for a user. Valid value range: [8-32]. Default to 12.

PasswordReusePrevention.description: User is not allowed to use the latest number of passwords specified in this parameter. A value of 0 indicates the password history check policy is disabled. Valid value range: [0-24]. Default to 0.

RequireLowercaseCharacters.description: Specifies if the occurrence of a lowercase character in the password is mandatory. Default to true.

RequireNumbers.description: Specifies if the occurrence of a number in the password is mandatory. Default to true.

RequireSymbols.description: (Optional Specifies if the occurrence of a special character in the password is mandatory. Default to true.

RequireUppercaseCharacters.description: Specifies if the occurrence of an uppercase character in the password is mandatory. Default to true.
